titleStmt.title: By the right honorable the lords, commissioners for the office of Earl Marshall of England
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Earl Marshal.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by the British Library.

"Giuen vnder our hands and seales, the tenth day of Nouember, in the sixteenth yeere of his Maiesties Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the fiftie two, At White-Hall. Anno Domini 1618."
Requiring that marriages, issue, coats of arms of all nobility be certified into the Office of Arms, at time of death, with fees for each rank.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
